purpose: Display a product feature with image, title, description and optional call-to-action in an alternating layout pattern

props.name: description
props.description: Detailed description of the feature and its benefits

props.name: image
props.description: Feature image with alt text for accessibility

props.name: imagePosition
props.description: Position of the image relative to content

props.name: bullets
props.description: Optional list of key points or sub-features

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Optional icon to display above the title

slots.name: media
slots.description: Custom media content to replace the default image

responsiveBehavior: Two-column layout on desktop with image and content side-by-side. Stacks vertically on mobile with image on top. Image takes 50% width on desktop, 100% on mobile.

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: If CTA is present, it must be keyboard focusable. Content should be readable in logical order.
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Use proper heading hierarchy. Image alt text should describe the feature being shown. Bullets should be announced as a list.

contentConstraints: Image aspect ratio should be 16:9 or 4:3
Bullets should have 2-5 items, each max 50 characters
nonGoals: Does not support video content in default implementation
Does not include parallax or scroll animations
Does not manage carousel or slideshow of features
exampleUseCase: Showcasing a key product feature like 'Real-time Collaboration' with a screenshot of the feature in action, descriptive text, and a 'Learn More' button.
